DOC.brief_title: Effects Of Nadroparin In Patients With Lung , Pancreas Or Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Hormone refractory prostate cancer within 6 month diagnosis , OR locally advance ( nonmetastasized ) pancreatic cancer within 3 month diagnosis , OR nonsmallcell lung cancer within 3 month stage IIIB . Exclusion criterion : Life expectancy < 3 month . Poor performance status ( Karnofsky < 60 ) . Need anticoagulant . Use nadroparin ( low molecular weight heparin ) reason include history heparininduced thrombocytopenia . Have brain metastasis . At high risk bleed platelet count < 50,000/mm3 . Have poor kidney function .
